alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Jasper (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 2:45AM CST until February 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Ste. Marie affecting Crawford and Jasper Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Ste. Marie. * WHEN...From this morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, County Highway 9 floods between Ste. Marie and Willow Hill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 19.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Embarras River Ste. Marie 19.0 18.6 Fri 1 am CST 19.4 18.5 17.3 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
